instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-2915A: What is 820-2915A? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.
definitions.820-2915: What is 820-2915? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.
definitions.PP3V3_S5: What is PP3V3_S5? PP3V3_S5 is a 3.3v power rail when the system is in an S5 soft off power state.
definitions.A1286: What is A1286? A1286 is a model number for a 15 inch size MacBook Pro Unibody from years Late 2008, Mid 2009, Mid 2009 , Mid 2010, Early 2011, Late 2011, Mid 2012 with EMC 2255, that may contain one of these boards depending on the year & configuration: 820-2330, 820-2532, 820-2523, 820-2533, 820-2850, 820-2915, 820-3330..

threads.title: First Post, <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2915A</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>, green light, no charge, no boot, no fan spin
threads.message:
Hello Everybody

first post.

I have a <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2915</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> (A?) 2011 early

before anybody says GPU, replace it or throw it in the bin, i want to point out i live on an island, called Lanzarote.
support is non existant so my conclusion is would rather spend money and resourcers, until i have found the a concrete error. and use this as a learning experience.

really doing my best to not waste your time. seen many Louis Video's, googled and applied simple logic.

[url]http://www.powerbookmedic.com/MacBook-Pro-15-Unibody-20GHz-Core-i7-Logic-Board-p-20995-o-6019.html[/url]

So.. green light, no charge, no boot, no fan spin
no water damage and no visible damage. 

so my logic tells me, i need to test the pp3 powerrail  (and watching certain videos :) )
i have trouble finding the correct schematics (via my usual channels)

off cause all help is appreciated.

Regards
Daniel
